columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the database.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a database uniquely.

columns.name: server_name
columns.description: The name of the parent server of the database.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the database.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the database.

columns.name: collation
columns.description: The collation of the database.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The creation date of the database.

columns.name: current_service_objective_id
columns.description: The current service level objective ID of the database.

columns.name: database_id
columns.description: The ID of the database.

columns.name: default_secondary_location
columns.description: The default secondary region for this database.

columns.name: earliest_restore_date
columns.description: This records the earliest start date and time that restore is available for this database.

columns.name: edition
columns.description: The edition of the database.

columns.name: elastic_pool_name
columns.description: The name of the elastic pool the database is in.

columns.name: failover_group_id
columns.description: The resource identifier of the failover group containing this database.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: Kind of the database.

columns.name: location
columns.description: Location of the database.

columns.name: max_size_bytes
columns.description: The max size of the database expressed in bytes.

columns.name: recovery_services_recovery_point_resource_id
columns.description: Specifies the resource ID of the recovery point to restore from if createMode is RestoreLongTermRetentionBackup.

columns.name: requested_service_objective_id
columns.description: The configured service level objective ID of the database.

columns.name: restore_point_in_time
columns.description: Specifies the point in time of the source database that will be restored to create the new database.

columns.name: requested_service_objective_name
columns.description: The name of the configured service level objective of the database.

columns.name: retention_policy_id
columns.description: Retention policy ID.

columns.name: retention_policy_name
columns.description: Retention policy Name.

columns.name: retention_policy_type
columns.description: Long term Retention policy Type.

columns.name: source_database_deletion_date
columns.description: Specifies the time that the database was deleted when createMode is Restore and sourceDatabaseId is the deleted database's original resource id.

columns.name: source_database_id
columns.description: Specifies the resource ID of the source database if createMode is Copy, NonReadableSecondary, OnlineSecondary, PointInTimeRestore, Recovery, or Restore.

columns.name: zone_redundant
columns.description: Indicates if the database is zone redundant or not.

columns.name: create_mode
columns.description: Specifies the mode of database creation.

columns.name: read_scale
columns.description: ReadScale indicates whether read-only connections are allowed to this database or not if the database is a geo-secondary.

columns.name: retention_policy_property
columns.description: Long term Retention policy Property.

columns.name: sample_name
columns.description: Indicates the name of the sample schema to apply when creating this database.

columns.name: service_level_objective
columns.description: The current service level objective of the database.

columns.name: service_tier_advisors
columns.description: The list of service tier advisors for this database.

columns.name: transparent_data_encryption
columns.description: The transparent data encryption info for this database.

columns.name: vulnerability_assessments
columns.description: The vulnerability assessments for this database.

columns.name: vulnerability_assessment_scan_records
columns.description: The vulnerability assessment scan records for this database.

columns.name: audit_policy
columns.description: The database blob auditing policy.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
